name: Hire Smart, Scale Fast with Hunter Miranda & Eric Farber
description:
Hire Smart, Scale Fast, hosted by Hunter Miranda, with co-host, Eric Farber, is the go-to podcast for entrepreneurs, founders, and business leaders looking to build powerful, agile teams through smarter hiring. Each episode dives into the strategies, tools, and mindsets that help companies scale with purpose, especially through the use of remote and global talent.

recent_episodes.title: Hire Remote Talent Without Adding Management Chaos
recent_episodes.description:
In episode #80, Hunter Miranda breaks down what actually makes remote hiring work for U.S. small business owners who need real capacity without losing control. He shares a practical approach to defining outcomes, hiring for reliability, and setting up lightweight systems that keep remote team members aligned. This episode is especially relevant for law firms, service providers, and founder-led teams that want to scale delivery without creating management chaos.

recent_episodes.title: The New Outsourcing Shift: How to Build Specialized Remote Teams
recent_episodes.description:
In episode #79, Hunter Miranda shares his journey of leveraging LinkedIn to enhance his business focus on hiring and talent acquisition. He discusses the importance of understanding customer personas and reframing problems in a therapeutic manner. The conversation delves into the growing demand for specialized roles in Latin America, the shift in outsourcing trends, and the necessity of embracing technology in business operations to remain competitive.
